place.settlement: wäräda Kǝlǝttä ʾAwlaʿlo, ṭabiya Qaḥen, qušät Qaḥen
place.note:
1300-1400
Däbr. A new church is being built at the rock near the old rock-hewn church, with the burial of the local Ṣadǝqan. A recent church above on the plain is dedicated to Michael.

16 Mss. and 4 scroll photographed: QES-001 “Missal”; QES-002 “Vita of George; Miracles of George”; QES-003 “Vita of the Righteous Ones”; QES-004 “Prayer of Incense and other texts”; QES-005 “Homiliary for the feasts St. Michael Miracles of St. Mikaʾel”; QES-006 “Vita of Righeous ones; Miracles of the Righteous ones”; QES-007 “Vita of ʾEwostatewos; Miracles of ʾEwostatewos; Image of ʾEwostatewos”; QES-008 “Book of the Marriage Ritual”; QES-009 “Book of the Covenant of the Righteous ones; Vita of the Righteous ones”; QES-010 “Bəsratä Yoḥannəs (fols. 3r-82r); Bəsratä Marqos (83r-122vb); Fəkare ʾIyäsus (123ra-132vb); Tənbitä Sabela (133ra-147); Dǝrsan Zä- Yohannəs ʾAfäwärq (read on the feast of Rufaʾel ) (fols. 141ra-161rb); Täʾamrä Rufaʾel (161rb-192rb)”; QES-011 “Book of the Funeral Rite”; QES-012 “Bandlet of Righteousness”; QES-013 “Excerpts from Dəqqwa”; QES-014 “Book of Hymns”; QES-015 “1Rite of the passion Week; Doctrina Arcanorum; Other texts for passion week ”; QES-016 “Bandlet of Righteousness”. =======
